articles.author: Oli Welsh
articles.title: Tetris’ Alexey Pajitnov and Henk Rogers reflect on their bromance - Polygon
articles.description: As an Apple TV Plus film based on the true story of the struggle for the rights to Tetris is released, the game’s creator and publisher remember their first meeting.
articles.content: Alexey Pajitnov and Henk Rogers have known each other a long time. The man who created Tetris and the man who (more or less) sold it to the world met 34 years ago in a government office in Moscow. La… [+10935 chars]

articles.title: Alleged Jonathan Majors Texts Don't Really Prove What His Lawyers Think - The Mary Sue
articles.description: The text messages that lawyers thought would exonerate Jonathan Majors of his assault charges actually had a very different effect.
articles.content: On March 30, Jonathan Majors’ lawyers publicly released text messages that they believed would clear his name of the assault charges against him. However, it has not had the impact they expected, as … [+7636 chars]
